scripts.start:frontend: cross-env PORT=3001 BROWSER=none npm start --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix backend" "cross-env PORT=3001 BROWSER=none npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend && xcopy frontend\build backend\public /E /I /Y
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build complete. Frontend copied to backend/public'
